# PED::REQUEST_ACTION_MODE_ASSET

## Summary
Requests the action mode assets

## Parameters
* **STRING** actionMode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Used to prevent delays for missions peds getting in action mode, forcing action mode
